name: War in the Gulf
overview: The Persian Gulf is the Paradise of the Black Gold (Petroleum). Many countries depend on the oil for its proper economic development. One ambitious politician, to satisfy his desire to control the world, organized an army with extraordinary fight power and occupy the Persian Gulf. The dependent countries stayed without conditions to face this dominator, then, they created an organization for protection of worldwide peace and sent a SUPER AH-64 helicopter to intervene in the enemy battlefield.
